matrix.vui
Interface DragAndDropViewerClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
BusinessObjectDialog, ConnectDialog, MainApplicationDialog, NavigatorDialog
public interface DragAndDropViewerClient

This interface is used to notify clients of certain events occurring in the life of a Viewer that supports drag and drop.

Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0

Method Summary
 boolean acceptDragAndDrop(Viewer viewer, ViewerGizmo gizmo, DragAndDropSource source)
          Test if a drop would be ok.
 void finishDragAndDrop(Viewer viewer, ViewerGizmo gizmo, DragAndDropSource source)
          The object has been dropped.
 DragAndDropSource startDragAndDrop(Viewer viewer, ViewerGizmo gizmo)
          Dragging is about to start.
 

Method Detail

startDragAndDrop

public DragAndDropSource startDragAndDrop(Viewer viewer,
                                          ViewerGizmo gizmo)
Dragging is about to start.
Parameters:
viewer - the viewer where the drag is occurring.
gizmo - the object where the drag started.
Returns:
the source to drag around
Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0

acceptDragAndDrop

public boolean acceptDragAndDrop(Viewer viewer,
                                 ViewerGizmo gizmo,
                                 DragAndDropSource source)
Test if a drop would be ok.
Parameters:
viewer - the viewer where the drag is occurring.
gizmo - the object where the drag is occurring, may be null.
source - the source of the drag
Returns:
true that a drop would be acceptable
Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0

finishDragAndDrop

public void finishDragAndDrop(Viewer viewer,
                              ViewerGizmo gizmo,
                              DragAndDropSource source)
The object has been dropped.
Parameters:
viewer - the viewer where the drop is occurring.
gizmo - the object where the drop occurred, may be null.
source - the source of the drag
Since:
ADK 7.0.2.0
